price: Saa ara na εteε. Nokorε sε, Yɛnim deε εda (Zul-Qar’nain) anim no ho asεm nyinaa.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
